entry.title: Another wonderful day at the official reopening of Doneraile Court last week. The 5th most visited free attraction, Doneraile Court and Gardens is located in the North Cork area of Ballyhoura Country and itâ€™s one of the Irelandâ€™s most popular hidden gems
entry.content: Another wonderful day at the official reopening of Doneraile Court last week. The 5th most visited free attraction, Doneraile Court and Gardens is located in the North Cork area of Ballyhoura Country and itâ€™s one of the Irelandâ€™s most popular hidden gems ğŸ’. The â‚¬2m refurbishment of the Doneraile Court by @opwireland opened up the second floor to the public. It is now open 5 days a week until mid June and guided tours are available from 10am to 4pm Wednesday to Sunday and Bank holidays. It will be open 7 days a week from mid June ğŸ™Œâœ¨ #heritageireland #OPW #visitdoneraile #visitballyhoura #castletownhouse #irelandshiddenheartlands #ballyhoura #munstervales #purecork #guidesofireland #visitcork @Munster Vales @Pure Cork @Irelandâ€™s Hidden Heartlands @

entry.content: âœ¨Looking for an epic outdoor activity that the whole family can enjoy? Look no further than Ballyhoura Mountain Biking trails! ğŸŒ³ğŸšµâ€â™‚ With its breathtaking scenery and thrilling trails, Ballyhoura is the perfect destination for an unforgettable #familyadventure. ğŸŒ¿ğŸŒ² Explore the Ballyhoura trails and plan your visit at the official #VisitBallyhoura website ğŸ‘‰ https://visitballyhoura.com/explore/ballyhoura-mountain-biking Don't worry if you don't have bikes! ğŸš²ğŸš² Trailriders Ballyhoura offer bike hire options to ensure everyone can join in on the fun. Check them out here: ğŸ‘‰https://www.trailriders.ie/ If you're new to mountain biking and want a guided session, we recommend getting in touch with Mark Britton of Britton Outdoors who runs half-day introductions sessions (approx 2.5 hours biking) at the Ballyhoura Trails. Find out more here ğŸ‘‰https://brittonoutdoors.com/mountain-biking/ So gather your loved ones, embrace the outdoors, and embark on an unforgettable mountain biking adventure in #BallyhouraCountry! ğŸŒŸğŸšµâ€â™€â€ğŸŒŸ *Video funded by Department of Rural and Community Development #ORIS #OurRuralFuture #Ireland2040 #BallyhouraMountainBiking #FamilyAdventure #OutdoorFun #ExploreNature #BikeHire #GuidedSessions #BallyhouraMountainBiking #FamilyAdventure #OutdoorFun #ExploreNature #BikeHire #GuidedSessions #IrishFamilies #FamilyTime #GetActive #DiscoverIreland #NatureExplorers #FamilyFriendly #OutdoorAdventures #HealthyLifestyle #QualityTime #IrishOutdoors #MountainBikingFun #WeekendVibes #FamilyBonding #BrittonOutdoors #Trailriders #IrelandsHiddenHeartlands #MunsterVales #LimerickEdgeEmbrace #PureCork #DiscoverIreland #ToursimIreland #BestMountainBiking @Irelandâ€™s Hidden Heartlands @Munster Vales @Pure Cork @ILoveLimerick @Discover Ireland

entry.title: ğŸŒ¿âœ¨ A huge THANK YOU to everyone who made the Ballyhoura Walking Festival 2023 a tremendous success! âœ¨ğŸŒ¿ Over 350 walkers joined us for an incredible weekend of adventure, and we couldnâ€™t have done it without your enthusiasm. A massive shoutout goes to our
entry.content: ğŸŒ¿âœ¨ A huge THANK YOU to everyone who made the Ballyhoura Walking Festival 2023 a tremendous success! âœ¨ğŸŒ¿ Over 350 walkers joined us for an incredible weekend of adventure, and we couldnâ€™t have done it without your enthusiasm. A massive shoutout goes to our dedicated volunteers who played an indispensable role in making this festival a success. A special mention goes to the incredible members of the Ballyhoura Bears Walking Club for their invaluable assistance in planning and leading the walks. A huge thanks to our ambulance crew from the Red Cross, who tirelessly drove around and ensured our safety throughout the festival. Weâ€™re also grateful for the unwavering support from the Kilfinane community, Joyce Brothers Music Festival Committee, Kilfinane Community Council, Ballyhoura CCE, Ballyhoura Heritage & Environment and Ballyhoura FÃ¡ilte volunteer members. A heartfelt thank you to Limerick County Council for their festival funding, which made this festival even more enjoyable for all. Weâ€™d also like to express our appreciation to Deebert House Hotel for providing refreshments and Centra in Kilfinane for supplying us with healthy goodies for our goodie bags. A special tip of the hat to our local guides who led our heritage walks in Kilmallock, Lough Gur, Mitchelstown, and Doneraile, including members of the Doneraile Drama Society. Your captivating stories added a whole new layer to our walks! There are too many more people to mention, but we do appreciate all your help and support. Weâ€™re already looking forward to next yearâ€™s adventures! ğŸŒ„ğŸ¥¾ #BallyhouraWalkingFestival #ThankYou #Community #Adventure #VisitBallyhoura #BallyhouraFestival
